activities: SmartRecruiters provides a hiring platform that companies use to advertise their job openings, accept online applications from candidates, and manage the candidate screening, interviewing, and selection process. When candidates from the EU apply to jobs advertised by companies using our platform, candidates generally provide their work information & contact information which we then provide to companies so they can properly follow up with the candidates. This is consistent with the practices of most applicant tracking systems in the marketplace.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
